proposed_strategy.name: Single Chunk (Prapathaka 1)
proposed_strategy.description: The entire first Prapathaka is loaded as a single chunk as its total size is well below the safety limit, maximizing efficiency.

execution_plan.description: Prefatory material and the entirety of Prapathaka 1 (Khandas 1 through 13).

parsing_instructions.justification: The Prapathaka is systematically divided into Khandas, which serve as the main structural and semantic sections for detailed parsing.

start_pattern.description: A new Khanda begins with a bolded heading indicating its ordinal number, followed by the word 'खण्डः'.

end_pattern.description: The end of a Khanda's commentary is marked by a concluding line specifying the Khanda number, often followed by 'भाष्यम्'.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The initial text, including the title, Shanti Patha, and Mangalacharana, should be treated as a 'Prefatory' section before the content of the first Khanda.
